oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Austin, Elizabeth L., 1904 April 29
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Elizabeth L. Austin, dated April 29th, 1904. Illustrates the first page of the document. She named her son Samuel E. Austin as heir, saying “my son the said Samuel E. Austin has stayed at home with me and taken care of me for the last fifteen years ….” Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Austin family
